entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
